alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 2:43PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strongs thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Red River, northern Natchitoches, northeastern Sabine and Winn Parishes through 330 PM CDT... At 243 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Natchitoches, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Winnfield, Campti, Allen, Martin, Clarence, Goldonna, Dodson, Ashland, Calvin, Robeline, Powhatan, Sikes, Grand Ecore, Hudson, Joyce, Black Lake, Chestnut, Clear Lake and Creston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana.
